title: An abstract approach to the Robin-Robin method
abstract:
Recently, their has been development of an abstract approach to the
Robin--Robin method, enabling the treatment of linear and nonlinear elliptic
and parabolic equations on Lipschitz domains within one framework. However,
previously this setting has not been applicable to initial-boundary value
problems. The aim of this short note is therefore to demonstrate that this
general framework can be applied to such problems as well.
